detectors.description:
RandomReality.updateOwner(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- owner = _addr ()

RandomReality.setGasPrice(uint256) () should emit an event for: 
	- gas_price = _price ()

RandomReality.setFee(uint256) () should emit an event for: 
	- fee = _fee ()

RandomReality.setPublisher(address).addr () lacks a zero-check on :
		- publisher = addr ()

RandomReality.updateEmergencyBrake(address)._addr () lacks a zero-check on :
		- emergency_brake = _addr ()

RandomReality.updateOwner(address)._addr () lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _addr ()

RandomReality.withdraw(address,uint256).addr () lacks a zero-check on :
		- r = addr.send(amount) ()

RandomReality.setFee(uint256) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (now - last_fee_increase_ts) < 86400 ()
detectors.markdown:
[RandomReality.setFee(uint256)]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [(now - last_fee_increase_ts) < 86400]()

detectors.description:
RandomReality.setGasPrice(uint256) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (now - last_gas_price_increase_ts) < 86400 ()
detectors.markdown:
[RandomReality.setGasPrice(uint256)]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected request_id = sha3()(msg.sender,wait_blocks,wait_secs,min,max,counter,gas_amount,default_api_key,block.number,now) ():
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [request_id = sha3()(msg.sender,wait_blocks,wait_secs,min,max,counter,gas_amount,default_api_key,block.number,now)]():
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected THROW ():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [THROW]():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.4.6 () allows old versions
solc-0.4.6 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.6 is not recommended for deployment
